full_summary:
### Tail Rotor Blade Tender Announcement
#### T8493-220044/A

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) — Competitive Solicitation

**Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is available under the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Free Trade Agreements with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and the UK.

**Region of Opportunity**: Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

**Region of Delivery**: Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

**Contact Information**

* Contracting Authority: Valerie Bourassa, Supply Officer (<valerie.bourassa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>)
* Contracting Authority Office: Acquisitions Branch, Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector (LAEPSS), Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Phone: (873) 455-0980

**Notice Description**

Trade Canada seeks suppliers to provide replacement tail rotor blades for the BELL 407 aircraft as part of the Supply Arrangement (SA) T8493-140035 series.

Invited suppliers:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Aero Supplies Inc
* Non-Destructive Testing Products Ltd
* Bell Textron Canada (Contracts)
* Dart Aerospace
* Maxcraft Avionics Ltd.
* MHD Rockland
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Ltd.
* Pole Air Aviation
* Professional Aviation Associates
* Simex Defence Inc
* Standard Aero
* Szabo Aviation
* Textron Aviation
* Tower Aerospace
* Tulmar Safety
* Unisource Technology Inc
* Zepoli International Inc
* PHP Canada
* BSF International Inc
* Helitrades Inc
* Field Aviation
* Alpine Aerotech
* JHT Defense
* Kadex Aero Supply
* National Helicopters
* Newcastle Aviation Partners LLC
* Southeast Aerospace

* CanRep Inc.
* Eagle Copters
* Genaire LTD
* Kitchener Aero (dba Mid-Canada Mod Center)
* Mills Sterling
* Tronosjet Maintenance
* Aero Technical Components
* Arnprior Aerospace

Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly by
